sentence.Network_en: I was to blame in part for this misdeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 对这个错误我要负部分责任.

sentence.Network_en: I am afraid he can not atone for all his misdeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 恐怕他无法抵偿他所有的罪行.

list.abs: his misdeeds brought him bad fortune ., 他不当的行为造成他悲惨的命运.
His past misdeeds redounded on him ., 他过去所做的坏事报应在他自己身上.

what happens when Do Young's terrible misdeed is revealed and that Sa Wol is actually the sister she abandoned at the train station all those years ago ?后会发生什么事不要杨氏可怕的罪行，揭示和萨网络唤醒其实是她的姐妹被遗弃在车站所有这些几年前？

entry.def: A misdeed is a bad or evil act.

example.ex: ...the alleged financial misdeeds of his government.
example.tran: 人们所指控的他的政府在财政方面的失误政策

means.word_mean: 1. improper or wicked or immoral behavior

auth_sentence.content: For each misdeed is an equally extravagant excuse.
auth_sentence.res_content: For each misdeed is an equally extravagant excuse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For each misdeed is an equally extravagant excuse.

auth_sentence.content: Was my misdeed really so awfully naughty?

auth_sentence.content: It asks penitents to list sins they have committed by misdeed or omission.

sentences.en: You should not have sold the car in that unsafe condition;sooner or later your misdeeds will come home to roost.
sentences.cn: 你不该把那辆不安全的车卖掉,你的不端行为迟早会得到报应。
